orbMode.classList.remove('hidden'); } function updateTime() { const now = new Date(); const timeString = now.toLocaleTimeString('en-US', { hour: 'numeric', minute: '2-digit', hour12: true }); const dateString = now.toLocaleDateString('en-US', { weekday: 'long', month: 'long', day: 'numeric' }); document.getElementById('currentTime').textContent = timeString; document.getElementById('currentDate').textContent = dateString; } function updateWeather() { fetch('http://localhost:8000/api/weather') .then(response => response.json()) .then(data => { document.getElementById('weatherIcon').textContent = data.icon || '☀️'; document.getElementById('weatherTemp').textContent = `${data.temperature || 23}°`; }) .catch(error => { console.log('Weather API not available, using defaults'); document.getElementById('weatherIcon').textContent = '☀️'; document.getElementById('weatherTemp').textContent = '23°'; }); } function setupTabs() { const buttons = document.querySelectorAll('.tab-button'); buttons.forEach(btn => { btn.addEventListener('click', () => { buttons.forEach(b => b.classList.remove('active')); document.querySelectorAll('.settings-content').forEach(c => c.classList.remove('active')); btn.classList.add('active'); document.getElementById(btn.dataset.tab + 'Settings').classList.add('active'); }); }); } async function loadModules() { const container = document.getElementById('modulesList'); const data = await window.zoeAPI.getModules(); container.innerHTML = ''; if (!data.modules || !data.modules.length) { container.textContent = 'No modules available'; return; } data.modules.forEach(mod => { const item = document.createElement('div'); item.className = 'module-item'; const label = document.createElement('label'); const toggle = document.createElement('input'); toggle.type = 'checkbox'; toggle.checked = mod.enabled; toggle.addEventListener('change', async () => { await window.zoeAPI.toggleModule(mod.name, toggle.checked); const key = (mod.scope === 'user' ? 'user-module-' : 'global-module-') + mod.name; localStorage.setItem(key, toggle.checked); }); const text = document.createElement('span'); text.textContent = `${mod.name} - ${mod.description}`; label.appendChild(toggle); label.appendChild(text); item.appendChild(label); container.appendChild(item); }); } // Load Matrix sync setting from server fetch('/api/settings').then(r => r.json()).then(data => { const cb = document.getElementById('matrix-sync-toggle'); if (cb && data.integrations) { cb.checked = data.integrations.matrix_enabled; } }); async function loadDiagnostics() { try { const data = await fetch('/api/diagnostics').then(r => r.json()); const diagDiv = document.getElementById('diagnostics-content'); if (data.error) { diagDiv.textContent = 'Error fetching diagnostics'; return; } const diskUsed = (data.disk.used / (1024 * 1024 * 1024)).toFixed(1); const diskTotal = (data.disk.total / (1024 * 1024 * 1024)).toFixed(1); const models = Object.entries(data.models) .map(([name, status]) => `
  • ${name}: ${status}
    • `) .join(''); diagDiv.innerHTML = `

    CPU Usage: ${data.cpu}%

    Disk Usage: ${diskUsed}GB / ${diskTotal}GB (${data.disk.percent}%)

    Running Containers: ${data.containers.join(', ') || 'None'}

    Models:

      ${models}
    `; } catch (err) { document.getElementById('diagnostics-content').textContent = 'Diagnostics unavailable'; } } document.getElementById('refresh-diagnostics').addEventListener('click', loadDiagnostics); loadDiagnostics(); setInterval(loadDiagnostics, 30000); // Update server when Matrix sync toggled const matrixToggle = document.getElementById('matrix-sync-toggle'); if (matrixToggle) { matrixToggle.addEventListener('change', () => { fetch('/api/settings', { method: 'PUT', headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' }, body: JSON.stringify({ integrations: { matrix_enabled: matrixToggle.checked } }) }); }); }
